newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Portugual industry outlook, demand favourable -INE.
newsitem.headline: Portugual industry outlook, demand favourable -INE.

text.p: The outlook for Portuguese industry remains good, with overall demand on a favourable trend and stocks of finished products nearing normal levels, the National Statistics Institute (INE) said in its June survey.
June's confidence indicator was stable compared with May but was higher than a year ago.
"In year-on-year terms, business opinion on June industrial performance was more favourable in all sub-sectors, particularly intermediate goods." it said.
Overall demand continued to rise, especially external demand, it said.
